content: Chapter 5 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in The Flaming Mountains, where lava flows and the paths are covered in ash. With the help of familiar faces, the Destined One treads the treacherous path to come face to face with the Bull King.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5-Golden_Child,_Crimson_Blood.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 - Golden Child, Crimson Blood', specifically from the subsection 'Chapter 5 Walkthrough Sections'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 5 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in The Flaming Mountains, where lava flows and the paths are covered in ash. With the help of familiar faces, the Destined One treads the treacherous path to come face to face with the Bull King.
